Speedup of 'nova list' benchmark by up to 40%, eliminates 3 lines in
top-10 cProfile methods.

Change-Id: I2d4636f94d88b4a7e38d1565fdd4d1b8a89e560e
"}, {'created': '2012-04-24 18:04:25.000000000', 'message': "Add caching to openstack.common.cfg.

Speedup of 'nova list' benchmark by up to 40%, eliminates 3 lines in
top-10 cProfile methods.

Change-Id: I2d4636f94d88b4a7e38d1565fdd4d1b8a89e560e
"}, {'created': '2012-04-24 18:04:25.000000000', 'message': "Add caching to openstack.common.cfg.

Speedup of 'nova list' benchmark by up to 40%, eliminates 3 lines in
top-10 cProfile methods.

Change-Id: I2d4636f94d88b4a7e38d1565fdd4d1b8a89e560e
"}, {'created': '2012-04-24 18:04:25.000000000', 'message': "Add caching to openstack.common.cfg.

Speedup of 'nova list' benchmark by up to 40%, eliminates 3 lines in
top-10 cProfile methods.

Refactoring by Mark McLoughlin:

- init cache before registering config-file and just let
  register_cli_opt() clear the empty cache

- use @__clear_cache on set_default() and set_override() since
  these are just used by the unit tests and doing so allows us
  to kill _remove_from_cache()

- use @__clear_cache on reset() too

- remove recursion from _get() and the substitute param

Change-Id: I2d4636f94d88b4a7e38d1565fdd4d1b8a89e560e
"}]
commit_message:
Add caching to openstack.common.cfg

Speedup of 'nova list' benchmark by up to 40%, eliminates 3 lines in
top-10 cProfile methods.

Change-Id: I2d4636f94d88b4a7e38d1565fdd4d1b8a89e560e

commit_message:
Typo fix in bin/instance-usage-audit.

The notify method now requires a context, which in this case should be
`admin_context` not `context`.

Change-Id: I53275d0e1c9a898a7c0d9685382bb52ffb2efa2c

subject: Generate a Changelog for Nova
messages:
[{'account_id': 679, 'date': '2012-04-24 15:14:50.000000000', 'content': "Patch Set 1: Do not submit

I don't see that we need ChangeLog in Nova; if we do, this probably should be discussed on the mailing list first.  In any case, using ChangeLog to determine which files to include is incredibly problematic.

And then, of course, there is the PEP8 error that SmokeStack turned up.  You *did* run the test suite before submitting this branch, right?"}, {'account_id': 24, 'date': '2012-04-24 15:36:25.000000000', 'content': 'Patch Set 1:

This is exclusively for the tarballs, Ubuntu ships tarball snapshots and users would love to know what we are including in the tarballs. Adding a ChangeLog that is generated when sdist is run would go a long way in keeping the users informed.'}, {'account_id': 24, 'date': '2012-04-24 17:53:33.000000000', 'content': 'Patch Set 1: Abandoned'}]

commit_message:
Generate a Changelog for Nova

Ubuntu uses a tarball to generate packages for Nova and
other openstack projects. This allows the user to find out
what is included in the tarball.

Change-Id: I405b53c5103e09106a5660a978ee64324bbe67aa
Signed-off-by: Chuck Short <chuck.short@canonical.com>

revisions:
[{'created': '2012-04-24 16:42:46.000000000', 'message': "Fix content type for qpid notifier.

Fix bug 980872.

This patch fixes a regression I introduced in
2d36facf14f4eb2742ba46274e04a73b5231aece.  In that patch, I adjusted the
content_type for messages sent with the qpid notifier to be
'application/json' to match a change that went into the kombu notifier.
Unfortunately, it's wrong.

I assumed based on the kombu change that notifications were being json
encoded before being passed into the notification driver.  That's not
the case.  The message is a dict.  So, just revert the change to set the
content_type and let Qpid encode the notification as 'amqp/map'.

Change-Id: Iea027409f6200109b97fed93073cff84bc915536
"}]
commit_message:
Fix content type for qpid notifier.

Fix bug 980872.

This patch fixes a regression I introduced in
2d36facf14f4eb2742ba46274e04a73b5231aece.  In that patch, I adjusted the
content_type for messages sent with the qpid notifier to be
'application/json' to match a change that went into the kombu notifier.
Unfortunately, it's wrong.

I assumed based on the kombu change that notifications were being json
encoded before being passed into the notification driver.  That's not
the case.  The message is a dict.  So, just revert the change to set the
content_type and let Qpid encode the notification as 'amqp/map'.

Change-Id: Iea027409f6200109b97fed93073cff84bc915536

commit_message:
Improved tools/hacking.py

* cleaner output
* fix bug 980009
* Fix N201
* N306: alphabetical order imports
* N401: docstring start
* N402: one line docstring start
* N403: multi line docstring end
* Until fixed, N40* will be disabled by default

Change-Id: I9addafdaa7a1f8fb950e14a5409f661dec6c7b87

commit_message:
Include name being searched for in exception message

Otherwise, it's not always clear what was happening while looking at
logs. Also, remove unused instance kwarg, this isn't a logging call.

Change-Id: Ib1be2d7ed5b3c658dc2a3ac4094b812ba95a5d3c

commit_message:
Removing XenAPI class variable, use session instead.

This is part of a series of refactoring which aim move towards using
functions instead of classes + classmethods within vm_utils and
volume_utils.

Change-Id: Id0d7d21a240dd3cbf2237d480dc23dfd4d8c0dc1

If time fails to import, this code won't run anyway

Change-Id: I7322ab5b5526afd3c02f48eb85066570b556bb75
"}, {'created': '2012-04-19 22:28:30.000000000', 'message': "Remove unused time keyword arg

It's not used anywhere, it aliases the imported time module and is
broken at best if given since we want to use the eventlet sleep
anyway (which is monkey patched into time.sleep)

Change-Id: I7322ab5b5526afd3c02f48eb85066570b556bb75
"}, {'created': '2012-04-19 23:21:13.000000000', 'message': "Remove unused time keyword arg

It's not used anywhere, it aliases the imported time module and is
broken at best if given since we want to use the eventlet sleep
anyway (which is monkey patched into time.sleep)

Change-Id: I7322ab5b5526afd3c02f48eb85066570b556bb75
"}]
commit_message:
Remove unused time keyword arg

It's not used anywhere, it aliases the imported time module and is
broken at best if given since we want to use the eventlet sleep
anyway (which is monkey patched into time.sleep)

Change-Id: I7322ab5b5526afd3c02f48eb85066570b556bb75

commit_message:
Remove __init__.py from locale dir

Previously, the __init__.py indicated that we have a custom locale package,
preventing imports of the locale package that ships with python itself.

* Fixes bug 977021

Change-Id: Id4921a1efd1a223790cc8b52917d00b387e9cba6
